ygData.subject: Re: What to buy?
ygData.msgSnippet: When I first started, my #1 mission was to get into patchwork - took up tailoring, fairly easy to do. Then, I got anything in leather, that couldn t be made in
ygData.messageBody:
When I first started, my #1 mission was to get into patchwork - took up
tailoring, fairly easy to do.

Then, I got anything in leather, that couldn't be made in patchwork.

Then, I started saving and replacing patchwork with banded, one piece at a
time - then working to leather.

I have a studded collar, purity belt and bloodstained mantle - the rest is
just straight banded.

Will go about working on replacing each of the banded pieces with a nice
magical one - as I find them, or see them for sale at a decent price.





At 07:06 PM 6/21/99 -0500, you wrote:
> I also have 130 plat - and a bunch of stuff to sell (I've been
>too lazy to do so) in the bank - prob about 25 plat or so (or more)
>Any suggestions on what to spend this on? Slyde of Xegony
